trustyai.model.ArrowModel

class trustyai.model.ArrowModel(pandas_predict_fun)

Wrapper for any predictive function, optimized for Python-Java communication.

The ArrowModel class takes advantage of Apache Arrow to drastically speed up data transfer between Python and Java. We recommend using an ArrowModel whenever seeking LIME or SHAP explanations.

__init__(pandas_predict_function)

Create the model as a TrustyAI PredictionProvider Java class.

Parameters
predict_funCallable[pd.DataFrame, np.array]

A function that takes in Pandas DataFrame as input and outputs a Numpy array. In general, the model.predict functions of sklearn-style models meet this requirement.

Methods

__init__(pandas_predict_function)

Create the model as a TrustyAI PredictionProvider Java class.

equals

get_as_prediction_provider(...)

Wrap the ArrowModel into a TrustyAI PredictionProvider.

hashCode

predict(inbound_bytearray)

The function called internally by predictAsync() when communicating between Java and Python.

predictAsync(inbound_bytearray)

Python implementation of the predictAsync() function with the TrustyAI PredictionProvider interface.

toString

get_as_prediction_provider(prototype_prediction_input)

Wrap the ArrowModel into a TrustyAI PredictionProvider. This is required to use an ArrowModel with any of the explainers.

Parameters
prototype_prediction_inputPredictionInput

A single example input to the model. This is necessary to specify the data schema to be communicated between Python and Java.

Returns
PredictionProvider

A TrustyAI PredictionProvider.

predict(inbound_bytearray)

The function called internally by predictAsync() when communicating between Java and Python. This function should never need to be called manually.

predictAsync(inbound_bytearray: ~jpype._jarray.long[]) → CompletableFuture

Python implementation of the predictAsync() function with the TrustyAI PredictionProvider interface.

Parameters
inputsList[PredictionInput]

A list of inputs.

Returns
CompletableFuture

A Java CompletableFuture containing the model outputs.
